title: Player Baseline Contract
description: Player's personal club distances and performance characteristics. Customizes the generic club specifications to individual player capabilities.

carry_distance.description: Player's actual carry distance in yards under standard conditions (sea level, 70Â°F, calm wind, dry fairway)

total_distance.description: Player's carry + roll distance on dry, firm fairway

consistency_notes.description: Optional notes on how consistent this distance is (e.g., 'very consistent', 'varies by 5 yards')

club_distances.description: Array of player's baseline distances for each club

typical_swing_speed.description: Approximate driver swing speed in mph (informational)

miss_pattern.description: Primary miss pattern with longer clubs

short_game_strength.description: How comfortable is player inside 100 yards?

notes: Player should measure/estimate distances when fresh and warmed up
These distances are baselines under standard conditions
Weather/elevation/course adjustments will be calculated by caddie system
Update periodically (every few months) as player improves
